review: Doctor Naveen was very professional, friendly and was able to diagnose the issue quite effectively and quickly, easing me magically from the fear of major health hazards as I was suffering from this issue for past 1 plus years. Thanks to Dr Naveen.He advised me * **** treatment,  in addition he enlightened me on some precious precautions and future course. I would strongly endorse and recommend the doctor, particularly in the current times where health care is suffering the lack of genuine doctors, Naveen sir was a pleasant experience for me.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your positive feedback..

review: we consulted  Dr. Naveen Reddy Garu  for my mother's Rheumatoid Arthritis problem. sir  has  identifies the problem as soon as we told him about the pain pattern  that my mother had . Dr. Naveen Reddy garu  has very patiently listened to us about our problem and ,explained the root cause very well . The best part is that he has called up personally  the next day to check how was my  mother's condition , which is a very greatful thing. Thanks alot for the care and support you give to the patients sir. Now I am very happy seeing my mother walking and working  normal. Thank you sir
reply_text: Thank you so much for your positive feedback

review: I Would very highly recommend  Dr.Naveen Reddy ,.Doctor had a lot of patience in explaining the problem and its causes, did not suggest unnecessary tests and medicines. Treatment plan was good and my dads blood sugar levels came down quite effectively. The way he explains us feels us very relaxed.**** ****** * **** **** *****

review: I was having fever from 4 days, so approached doctor online on practo and then physically the other day. He has prescribed me some tests and it was found that I had jaundice so he prescribed few tablets and now situation is better. He has taken good care in hospital so will definitely recommend him.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your positive response

review: ********* ****** * I strongly recommend Dr Naveen Reddy sir.. , Am suffering with severe joint pains, not able to hold small glass, early morning hand stiffness since 1 year, consulted so many hospitals, where they are doing tests and giving pain killers. .i consulted dr Naveen Reddy sir with severe pain and swelling in my both wrists and hands. Sir noticed it as Rheumatoid arthritis, along with Hypothyroidism. Gave treatment,  I got lot of relief within one month of his treatment, now am able to work..Thank you so much sir , you  improved my quality of life and confidence ..
reply_text: Thank you so much for your positive feedback
